alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Lee; Leslie; Magoffin; Morgan; Owsley; Perry; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 4:30AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, northeastern Owsley, southwestern Johnson, north central Leslie, northern Perry, northwestern Knott, northwestern Floyd, Breathitt, Magoffin, southeastern Lee and eastern Wolfe Counties through 500 AM EDT... At 430 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Lykins to Elkatawa to Cowcreek. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dumont, Kernie, Quicksand, Bethanna, Inverness, Hager, Patton, Stella, Haddix and Epson around 435 AM EDT. Gullett, Flintville, Gifford, Lost Creek, Clayhole, Smith Branch, Wilstacy, Press, Fritz and Hendricks around 440 AM EDT. Salyersville, Mason, Lakesville, Hardshell, Beech, Burning Fork, Stringtown, Mashfork, Ned and Cyrus around 445 AM EDT. Noble, Marshallville, Gays Creek, Royalton, West Royalton Station, Bradley, Skaggs, Sublett, Ivyton and Swampton around 450 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Krypton, Gypsy, Buck, Mosley Bend, Gapville, Confluence, Ary, Toulouse, Lamont, Fredville, Hazard, Dotson, Bearville, Brainard, Talcum, Bonanza, Elmrock, Orchard and Gunlock. THIS INCLUDES THE FOLLOWING HIGHWAYS... Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 49 and 76. Hal Rogers Parkway between mile markers 48 and 55, and near mile marker 59. Kentucky Highway 80 in Knott County between mile markers 1 and 3. Kentucky Highway 80 in Perry County between mile markers 9 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Knott; Lee; Leslie; Magoffin; Morgan; Owsley; Perry; Wolfe
